text: Timothy Paul Brooks (December 4, 1947 - June 30, 2020) was an American professional wrestler. He was better-known by his ring name "Killer" Tim Brooks. He competed in North American regional promotions such as in the National Wrestling Alliance (NWA), Pacific Northwest Wrestling (PNW) World Wrestling Council and World Class Championship Wrestling (WCCW) and Southwest Championship Wrestling (SWCW) during the 1970s and 1980s. Brooks was born in Dallas, Texas. Brooks died on June 30, 2020 at his home in Waxahachie, Texas from cancer at the age of 72.Killer Tim Brooks Dies ==References== ==Other websites== *Online World of Wrestling profile *CageMatch profile Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American professional wrestlers Category:Cancer deaths in Texas Category:Professional wrestling promoters Category:Sportspeople from Dallas
title: Tim Brooks (wrestler)
